ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Leeroy Jenkins
ygData.msgSnippet: That was about all I did for awhile. Harvest and craft. :-) Mostly harvesting. My mother really got into the harvesting/crafting. She s now a master clothier
ygData.messageBody:
That was about all I did for awhile. Harvest and craft. :-)
Mostly harvesting. My mother really got into the harvesting/crafting. She's now a master clothier and makes a ton of money selling stuff in the bazaar. She sells about 20 items every day.
I had done some dancing but they made it sort of pointless because they took away the healing ability so I trained up in dancing and then did a respec to be an architect.
Too bad you can't have dancers in EQ.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-06-09, 08:15:00 you wrote: =======

>Hm, they must have changed it since I played. It's been a while. My
>husband used to play an entertainer, and I thought I remembered him
>dancing in synch. I could be thinking of the musicians though.
>
>I just holed up in my house and cooked most of the time. The outside
>SWG world was a mystery to me unless I was harvesting, lol.
>
>Su wrote:
>
>>Well, they don't make you dance in synch. The band leaders can make the musicians all flourish at the same time. I'm not sure if a squad leader can make the dancers all do the same flourishes but they would have to be doing the same dances. Musicians can only play the song that the first musician started. Dancers can do whatever dance they want.
>>luv,
>>-Su





--
